name: Merrenoloth
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The merrenoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: charm person, darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, gust of wind
* 3/day: control water
* 1/day: control weather

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The merrenoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

abilities.name: Teleport.
abilities.description: As a bonus action, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
